headline: Ask HN: Why is Apple Music lightyears behind Spotify from a technical POV?
description:
I used Spotify briefly on an iPhone 13 Pro and I immediately felt how responsive everything was. Loading playlists, playing a track, searching, loading other types of content. It's shocking how good Spotify's streaming tech is. Then I went back to Apple Music again and I immediately felt how slow and unoptimised everything was in comparison.

From a technical perspective, how is Spotify, which has a 100 times smaller market cap, able to completely demolish Apple in streaming technology?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么从技术角度看，苹果音乐比Spotify落后很多？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼從技術角度看，蘋果音樂比Spotify落後很多？
description_zh-Hans:
我在iPhone 13 Pro上简短地使用了Spotify，我立刻感觉到了一切是多么的反应灵敏。加载播放列表、播放曲目、搜索、加载其他类型的内容。Spotify的流媒体技术如此之好，令人震惊。

从技术角度来看，Spotify的市值是苹果的100倍，它是如何在流媒体技术方面完全摧毁苹果的？
description_zh-Hant:
我在iPhone 13 Pro上簡短地使用了Spotify，我立刻感覺到了一切是多麼的反應靈敏。加載播放列表、播放曲目、搜索、加載其他類型的內容。Spotify的流媒體技術如此之好，令人震驚。

從技術角度來看，Spotify的市值是蘋果的100倍，它是如何在流媒體技術方面完全摧毀蘋果的？
